Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The foosmd was delicious. We ordered two tapas, two main dishes, and two desserts. Worth every penny. The manager (I think) came out and talked to each table. Staff was wonderful, the restaurant nice and comfortable atmosphere. 5/5 reccomend and would go back to try more tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Ensalada de Espana was amazingly good with cold bacon.  Paella was salty, it is good for 2.  Carne asada bao buns-the arrachera steak was lukewarm, burnt is the other side, undercook on the other and then the inside was rare… …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We were quickly seated and the chef gave us complimentary snacks before we began eating. The portions were really big and definitely worth the money despite the restaurant already being inexpensive! Our waiter, Rudy, was super welcoming and …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: WOW WOW WOW! What an amazing  dinner!! The wait staff was so informative, the drinks were on point and the food is phenomenal. The Chef took time to grab a picture with us and made us feel right at home. The waiter answered every and any …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Friendly, efficient staff. Delicious ham and cheese sandwich with French fries, served hot. Restaurant was not at all crowded. A variety of interesting items on the menu. Both traditional favorites and contemporary menu items. Fine dining …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: At hotel 3 nights. Have always liked this restaurant. Had B Sprouts plate that was very small. Have had it before so I know what it is supposed to be. Seemed like they were running thin on the Romesco and Sprouts. That was until the table …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: This place has amazing food, drinks, service and atmosphere. The chef is the amazing Mark Quinones. Highly recommend eating here.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: A+++ My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Andaluz by Hilton on our trip to Texas. After checking in, we decided to investigate our dining options. Not wanting to drive anywhere, we decided to enjoy the hotel's amenities and dined at the MAS …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Staying at the hotel. Ordered take-out and they were supposed to call when the order was ready. They didn't, so by the time I went down to check what was going on, I was given a bag of cold food that nobody seemed to care about. Got 5 …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: About the most creative and civilized restaurant within about five square miles. Tucked into the very nice Hotel Andaluz, you can get anything from about the best hamburger I've ever had all the way to tapas. I think the only area of need …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
This place has a nice trendy semi fancy feel nested inside a cool old hotel now in the Hilton Curio collection...
The Tapas were all excellent and more than flavorful and we'll presented! The …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: This place is amazing! The best food I have had in so long. We tried 7 dishes and each had their own unique flavor that was amazing. I tend to shy away from hotel food but not the case here. Please come here and enjoy!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: A little bit disappointed they only have the holiday menu for Christmas dinner and no tapas options.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Great tapas and sangria. Our server Rudy was superb! Chef came out and checked on all tables. We tried the specials too which was based off of finds from the local farmers market.  Place was perfect for a special occasion but not too stuffy. Highly recommend.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: My husband and I made two visits to MÁS Tapas Y Vino during the past week. We went with our family for our first visit a week ago, and by ourselves today. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The tapas were delicious, especially the potatoes. The drinks were to die for, I strongly suggest the L3s (local lavender lemon drops). I came here while visiting from the DC area and these tapas reminded me of good ole' DC cooking. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Good food at a reasonable downtown price. The patatas tapas and the vegetable paella are so good. Just be warned - the portions are huge, even for tapas.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We tried this restaurant after reading reviews on TripAdvisor.  It did not disappoint.  We would definitely recommend and definitely return.  The service and the food were top notch.  We tried the brussel sprouts, Spanish bruschetta, green …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We had the fried brussel srouts as an appetizer, and it was nice and crisp on the outside, with a tasty dip. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Very delicious food!  Chef Marc gives wonderful attention to detail and his dishes are extraordinary!  He visits with each customer and make you feel special.  Will definitely be back

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We had Elizabeth as our server - an honestly beautiful and compassionate person, let alone a professional and friendly server. Not only was she incredibly knowledgeable about the menu and wine, but she was also incredibly kind through an …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Not a Tapas guy because I always leave hungry. However MAS is legit great food at fare prices. From the Reposado “old Fashion” to the grilled brussel sprouts to the amazing full entrees, MAS does not disappoint. Definitely will visit again.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Mas tapas y vino is a very nice restaurant to go have breakfast lunch or dinner or even brunch at. I was there for lunch. Their sandwiches are very good. The restroom was very clean also. The waiter Michael was very professional and polite. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Modern restaurant located inside the Andaluz hotel. I've enjoyed every dish I have gotten from MAS. Great food and good drinks in a fantastic location. On the weekends you can get a table in their differently themed cabanas for a more private experience. Busy on the weekends so call and get a reservation.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Chef Marc Quiñones took great care of my husband and me celebrating our anniversary. The food was incredible and you can tell he loves feeding people. It was a beautiful evening.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Disappointed.   The papas bravas tasted like the same frozen potatoes used for breakfast potatoes.  The Octopus was so tough it was inedible could not cut with a steak knife.  At least they took this off the bill.  Ordered the ribs and I …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We decided on the crispy Brussels, tempura fried stuffed squash flowers, Iberian black pig secrets (my favorite), and steak with potatoes.  All were creative, delicious, and we could have not been happier.  The perfect place for an enjoyable food experience!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The food was good, especially the potatoes. Really liked the bao buns. I was expecting more of a wine list since the name of the place was tapas and wine, but we were rather disappointed in the selection. Can’t wait to revisit and try the burger.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Hate to be the bearer of bad news, but this was not the great meal we were expecting. In previous years it’s been quite good. I suspect the hotel accountants have won and the chef is quite depressed. Ingredient quality (which is the only …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We really enjoyed the beautiful enclosed patio upstairs. We ordered the Mac us back, the mezze, and the spanish bruschetta with mushroom sauce. Everything was delicious and very filling, 3 tapas was plenty for the 4 of us!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Rudy is the best bartender in town! There isn't anything on the food or drink menu here that is mediocre. MAS tapas y vino and Hotel Andaluz are pure class on every level from the staff, the atmosphere, to the services/products provided.  I look forward to frequenting their establishment.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Omg omg the food was to die for! We had such a good time here,went out for my birthday and I couldn't have asked for a better night out! We ordered 5 different dishes and the 4 of us all shared. Compliments to the chef seriously!!!!! Thank you for making my birthday such a great night!!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The Paella was the most expensive and the most disappointing. It tasted like risotto in tomato sauce with 4 shrimp. And it was a small portion. We have had Paella all over the country and in Spain. None of them looked or tasted like this.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Went in this morning to get two burritos. I was charged $12 per burrito plus a $5 gratuity. I don't know why the gratuity if I was not dining in nor was I staying at the hotel. Total was $31.59. The burritos were NOT worth the price! There …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Had dinner on Christmas Eve. Wonderful service, delicious meals and just a beautiful restaurant.  The chef visits the tables,  which I love!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
Great service, very professional waiters.
However, the food is very expensive.
The food combinations are very luxurious and unique, but it wasn't our absolute …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We went on a Monday, so it was quiet.  The food was excellent, all we took home were the bones for the dog.  The coffee was good, the tequila was excellent.  The only word of caution I would share is, though the Spanish cheese tray is …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Peppers were not blistered, but were limp and missing course salt flakes. Bruschetta is equivalent to mushroom gravy with crostini.  Asparagus veggie medley with corn as a filler.  Octopus with bolognese was the worst.  The menu reads as a …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Was not impressed. Certain tapas where quite skimpy and we had to ask for refires which took too long. The last item my party got was lamb shanks medium rare. When they came out, they where cooked well and where dry. At this point we just …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: It’s a strange time to go out to eat but they did a nice job of setting up the upstairs open air patio for it in a safe way.  My wife and I started with two tapas-the Patatas Brava which was excellent and the Iberian Pork which tasted great …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I was disappointed. The background  music was too loud, we had to raise our voices to talk to each other.  And, we waited for an hour or more for our food. The waitress did bring us a  complementary appetizer. The kebabs were good, but not exceptional. My friend ordered the Cuban sandwich,  it looked good, but he didn't comment.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: the veggie paella was a huge disappointment. overcooked rice, super saucy, the broccoli that was tempura-fried had several portions of it that were undercooked (warm mushy batter anyone?). when the server brought us another piece it was …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: COVID-19 Anniversary dinner.  Always solid food and drinks.  Limited menu, but everything really good.  Must try the Secreto tapa and Manchego mac n cheese.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We had the tapas. 4 different items that were each awesome on there own plus 2 desserts to share. The Tribeca cocktail was wonderful. We will be back.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I would not recommend this restaurant for Tapa's.  I was very disappointed with the food.  One dish (Octopus) we sent back because it was so over cooked and tough we could not even cut it with a steak knife.  The best thing about dinner was our bottle of wine!!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Great food, great atmosphere. Made a second visit and am making this a 5 star. Amazing service top to bottom. To quote my favorite body builder of all time "I'll be back"

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Fabulous! Beautiful atmosphere! Great, Friendly, Talented people work here! Amazing menu! I look forward to having diner there again soon!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Mars is amazing food delightful I thought they're deconstructed the pork and beans was ingenious flavors exceptional they have all their covid thing going on which is still an irritation but totally worth it prices are reasonable if you're ever in downtown Albuquerque Copper and 2nd you need to go the food is great

Name: Mas Tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Disrespectful front desk lady. She wasn't ready to seat us in the night even when there were plenty of tables available. The lady at the bar also was rude. We decided not to be humiliated any further and walked out.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Very good food and atmosphere. Waitress did not care about us or our experience :( will try again hopefully with a better server.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Food was very good.  Fortunate enough to meet and speak to Chef Marc.  He spent time talking to us and telling us about his Hell's Kitchen e perience. …

Name: Mas Tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Best place ever. Staff was over accommodating and the dining experience was excellent. Planning on having every birthday celebration there from here on in. Great job team!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: My son was married at Hotel Andaluz this weekend. Chef Marc started out that day by watching the mothers struggling to carry in the wedding dress. He graciously offered his help. Fast forward to the evening - the food he prepared that night …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We stayed at the Andaluz three nights and had cocktails and dinner two out of those three.  Both the cocktails and the tapas & entrees are original and delicious.  Portion sizes are generous; one evening the two of us easily made a meal out …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Tasty tapas, larger portions than expected. The atmosphere is relaxed within a cool Aztec vibe Hilton hotel.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Amazing food! The pulpo dish and chicken pinchos are my top favorites! Definitely recommend!

Name: Mas Tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Sooooooo goood! Every plate brings a new unique flavor. Highly recommend!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Elegant restaurant with some Spanish tapas re-elaborated in American style located inside a level hotel. Good wines choice. Affordable prices.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We stayed in Andaluz on a long road trip that included Albuquerque.   I really had hoped the hotel's in-house tapas place would be great but was pretty disappointed.   I can see the chef's concepts and can appreciate the intent, but …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: we came to visit Albuquerque for a month and this was the first stop. Located inside the beautiful Hotel Andaluz. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The arugula salad was good. I had the lobster wellington with tarragon risotto and the welly was over done and the risotto was under. The steak my date had was over as well. All in all it was a decent meal but a little lackluster considering the occasion. However, the ambiance and drinks were fantastic.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Ordered a beef Wellington! It was super good! Chef Marc was the best at making the beef wellington and came to our table and chatted with us for a bit. My son loves the fries. The reason I gave a 4 star was because the cake was dry and stale!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
The saving grace about this restaurant is the service. Shirah is amazing! She is the only reason we didn’t leave after the second app.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Really like my Cubano but mostly rating based on the excellent service while I was having a rushed lunch before the train arrived.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Food was amazing. Every time I've been here the service has been great, and the wait has been non-existent!!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Provides a warm, earthy atmosphere with unique dishes and engaged service. Rudy, thanks for the experience.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Nice historic building decorated with a bit of a Moroccan flair. Reserve a private table off the lobby.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The food was so good!!! The squash  stuffed with Goat was tasty, the salmon was cooked to perfection, the half chicken had a wonderful flavor and service was timely and accommodating. (Out of towners)

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Good selection of wines. Interesting selection of tapas. I choose a delicious selection of cheeses. Serving size could be shared amongst friends. Staff was attentive and friendly.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: My brother travels extensively & eats out frequently. He was impressed with the fare and the service. We like to bring out of town guests to this venue as it hasn't failed to impress! Our food arrived promptly and was served hot. Everything tasted delectable. The wind picked up and it started raining (monsoon season)

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Over the top amazing service and scrumptious food! Highly recommend for a date night!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
The food was decent but I didn't feel wowed.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Excellent meal for our first time dining in their establishment. Got the ribeye special with red chile demi glace. Let me tell you, this was hands down, the best demi I've ever tasted. And the onion rings that came on the side were battered in a very light and airy, well seasoned batter. Chef Marc really knows what he's doing!!!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The pork belly tapas, asparagus calabacitas tapas, salmon entree & steak entrees are fire. The red sangria is amazing also.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Good fresh food and fair prices, good service 👍🏻👌🏻

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Nice place love the food!  Great drink menu and wine list.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Fun tapas and entrees that are absolutely stunning and tasty.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Classy environment inside the coolest hotel in ABQ. Shrimp/chorizo dish was unique and flavorful. Chicken sandwich was hearty and satisfying. Great place.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We really enjoyed the food and atmosphere of the gem of a restaurant. Lovely, open decor and pleasant (not too loud) music are great complements to the food. Did I mention how good the food is?

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Perfect birthday meal.  Celebrity sighting too!  I didn't bother them though.  Great place.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Tapas were really good - bacon wrapped dates and the coconut shrimp on couscous.  Roast chicken is extremely salty appears to be brine soaked or injected and then drowned in barbecue sauce which is regrettable as the chicken was perfectly …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Loved the bacon wrapped dates and gambas al ajillo(shrimp) tapas.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Chef is awesome, very personable. Steak was really good.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
The whole place is like a dream.
With my stay, i got a meal voucher for being diamond member, so breakfast was the amazing house sausage,  salsa and eggs. I don't know about Albuquerque but i do know about this place! Loved every moment.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Brussels were dried like straw.  Breading fell off chicken sandwich. Three of us ate. Only liked risotto.  Five people ate next to us and shared they didn’t care for their food. Chocolate cake awful.  Was nothing like reviews!  We ate there three nights ago. Also stayed in hotel.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Looked for best happy hours in Albuquerque. Called and made reservation for happy hour. Upon arrival was told there is no happy hour.  I told them about reviews and web site .  No way.  Said would talk to management about it later. Very misleading!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We were there around 6pm and we were the only ones there. I checked online and noticed the menu included Bone Marrow and other interesting dishes. The ambiance is lovely. When we got seated we were handed a different menu and was told because of Covid, the menu was limited. nice

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: My partner and I have come here multiple times, and the food has always been delicious. The atmosphere is warm and relaxing, and the service is superb. It's a great place to get a feeling of Spain without the transatlantic flight. This is a …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Incredible tapas and a great experience. Wait staff was attentive and friendly, making helpful recommendations. This is a good spot to come if you have dietary restrictions as well. Tapas were larger than average. Very high quality ingredients. Love in the food you can taste. Thanks for a stellar experience!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Waited an hour and a half for four meals, crunchy risotto and mediocre food. Food didn’t all come out together, specialty drinks were made incorrectly, we were very disappointed because the location is beautiful, but it’s not worth the …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I wish I knew our server’s name because he was fantastic. The cost can get pretty high so order smart. The elk tenderloin is to die for and the bacon wrapped dates were delicious. With our table of six, we tried a lot of the tapas. Wine recommendations were decent but expensive whiskey pours were a bit anemic. Still good though.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Great ambiance and food, will absolutely go again. Chef was asked to make me grilled jalapenos and he did...(not on the menu)... The fact that this was done for me was extra special.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The portions were large. The flavour was  above average.  The service exeptional.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We were there around 6pm and we were the only ones there. I checked online and noticed the menu included Bone Marrow and other interesting dishes. The ambiance is lovely. When we got seated we were handed a different menu and was told because of Covid, the menu was limited.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The ambience of this establishment is great. The cocktails are on point.  I am looking forward to trying the menu as my first time was during a prix fixe Easter dinner.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: OMG!! My wife and I were so happy with the food!! I'll tell you i don't mind paying for wonder food! And may i say COMPLIMENTS to the Chef!! The use of flavors was extraordinary! We will definitely be back!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The restraunt is stunning and the vibes are great. The staff is very professional and we'll put together. I'm glad their employee Shelby waved us down while we were walking by to come in and eat. She took care of us and gave us such great …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I love this place. Every time we go the food is excellent. The staff is friendly and helpful. We went for our anniversary and they set a special table for us. They brought out a custom dessert with happy anniversary written on the plate in …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: This was not $90/person food. Uninspired and overpriced. The pork taco appetizers were meh (you can easily make better at home without much work), the chicken had ketchup bbq sauce, and the steak was overcooked and lacking flavor other than …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Hands down the best Mac n Cheese I’ve ever had, and everything else I’ve had from here is incredible! Chef Marc Quiñones out does himself with every new menu he rolls out! Can’t wait for the next time! Also...   Giusseppe is the epitome of world class service! 👌🏽

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The food was excellent. Service was lacking. There were only 5 table occupied and I had to wave to receive the wine list. Then the $14 red wine was served in a white wine glass while all the tables had larger glasses on it. The Mimosa was …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I love to enjoy a glass of wine and small meal here.  The atmosphere is quiet, the service is impeccable and attentive. I especially like the fact that it is easy to sit with a companion and be able to have a conversation without shouting …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: What a experience! Marc came by to say hi & talked to us for our anniversary. Got the special beef welighton medium rare! Cooked perfect, slid right off the fork! Also got salmon! Very juicy & flavorful! Ended with chocolate cake! …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
My first time having tapas ever and boy was I blown away!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Pricey but you get good food! Amazing flavor mixing and quality food. Will definitely be going back for "treat yourself" meals.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Very good tapas restaurant.  The selection is not very large, but what it does,it does well. We didn't have any entrees but the standard in the kitchen seems to be across the board. Highly recommended for tapas.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Chicken sandwich should not have been sent out. Half of it was overcooked and just crumbled. Everything else we had was great but disappointed they let something that bad come out of the kitchen.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The ambiance, the cuisine, the staff and the location...perfect. This is a great place for date night, birthday dinner or just another Thursday night. This is one of my favorite restaurants in town. So many flavors and I've never had a dish I didn't like.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We shared several tapas - all excellent!...especially with a good wine

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Perfect end to a long day. This unique eatery is part of the Andaluz Hotel next to the convention center. I started with the bruschetta, followed up with the grilled artichokes and finally the scallops. Each plate was fantastic in flavor …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Really rude staff. They seemed to give excuses not to seat and serve us while there were many tables available and it was already late at night. Will never go to this place again

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: As an indigenous business owner, it was totally disappointing to be ignored. Never again! I'll take my money elsewhere

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
The atmosphere is great, service was okay. Food, gets a huge thumb down. Over priced and zero flavor. The cheese plate was the best thing there.
Probably wont return to eat... I'm not sure how this has such great reviews.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Excellent excellent excellent! We had been really slow service from our server but the food and Ambience were fantastic as always. We came here for a Valentine's Day special they were doing and had a five-course meal that was utterly fantastic. Shouldn't take two and a half hours at any point though.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Delicious Thanksgiving dinner! Prepared with creativity and the service was superb!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:

Name: Mas Tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We had high expectations of this tapas restaurant and wine bar. The space is beautiful and exciting but the food missed the mark. Good quality ingredients and reasonable presentation, however the seasoning was off.  The quail was cooked …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Absolutely TERRIBLE service.  Slow and rude waitress and mediocre food.  The "fried" brussel sprouts were soggy and the chicken was blanf.  Cocktails were pure liquor with no flavor.  We waited 20 minutes after sitting down in the bar for …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We very much enjoyed our brunch here.  Our server was attentive,  the food was delicious,  and the ambiance was quite pleasant.   It was a bit weird they were painting the ceiling during business hours, but overall the experience was a good one.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Amazing food and cocktails. We had a corn and green chile risotto that was outstanding and the Mezze tapas were delicious.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I've eaten here for lunch on two separate occasions. Most recently we ate at a table inside. Previously we ate in a casbah. I really like the atmosphere here. The casbah nooks are especially nice for a more intimate gathering with a group …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Wonderful place to step away from the world for a few minutes and enjoy some small plates and wine.  Attentive service and varied choices for tapas or some larger plates. Sufficient wine list.  I highly recommend coming in through the hotel lobby and taking a few minutes to admire the wonder architecture and decor.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: A great restaurant on an exterior corner of Hotel Andaluz. Outdoor and indoor seating, as well as service inside the hotel lobby. We had bone marrow and rabbit tapas with both portions being meal sized. We ate in the lobby so we could watch the band The drink specials were great too. Awesome place.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Am amazing Valentine's meal!! Everything was delicious and service was great!!! We will definitely be back now that we can dine in restaurants again!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Great food and great cocktails. Good date night atmosphere. My partner and I love coming here, but to avoid going all out we usually go to the bar which has many of the same things in a little less formal atmosphere. We have always had great service here though. Definitely would recommend.

Name: Mas Tapas

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Disappointed. The place is nice, but the food is off. 3 of the 4 dishes we tried were too salty and garlicy, almost bitter. I got thirsty for hours after our meal. They are still tasty, but lack the delicacy you would expect from a place that sells themselves as fine dining.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Restaurant that is part of the Hotel Andaluz. I stayed at the hotel for a conference. The first night I was there, my coworkers & I had dinner at this restaurant. We did not have the greatest experience as the service was slow, the food …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I highly recommend checking out this restaurant when you are in downtown ABQ. They have an award winning chef and wine list, and their staff is always friendly. The atmosphere is refined and welcoming, and the menu has many healthy options. When you go, definitely order the patatas bravas (maybe not so healthy, but WORTH IT!!)!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: This place is aMASing! Seriously. The tapas are phenomenal and if you have never been to a Tapas bar before, I recommend getting several tapas for the table OR full sized entrees. I definitely  advise against doing both ! …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Absolutely awesome! Can't wait to go back, Chef MQ is a complete gentleman, the server Rudy knew what we needed before we could ask! We couldn't have asked for a better night! #supportlocalchefs

Review Text: First of all, this place is nominally vegetarian. Even my server was upfront about it being a "protein heavy" menu. And I definitely wouldn't expect to find any vegan options, save for maybe one salad. …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Went last year after looking at Hotel Andaluz for a potential rehearsal dinner site. They gave us the “golden ticket” to Más Tapas y Vino, and oh my goodness, what a night. Dinner was amazing. Highly recommend.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: I have eaten at Lucia three times now, first two were terrific experiences. However, last visit was absolutely awful. Our waiter seriously seemed stoned or drunk because he could not focus, would get lost in the middle of a sentence, walked …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Not a fan of their "tapas" menu. Overpriced for literally two (2) bites, weird combinations... purple grapes and green olives in oil??? BLEGH!!! Service is hit-or-miss. Downstairs has great service inside their tiny bar, not so much in the …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Food is great but the chef was yelling at his employees the whole time. Our party of 10 all noticed and it was very annoying and no employee should be treated like that. Almost like he was trying to be Gordon Ramsay and seemed like everyone was all up tight around him.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Chef Marc Q is the best! I am a fan of his and follow him where he goes. Everything on the menu is amazing and unlike anything you have had before. Sign up to receive emails and try one of his wine dinners (you are welcome 😉).

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Mezze was good. View was great.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Incredible food, worth more than what they charge. Had the brisket sandwich for lunch. Not truly authentic Andalucía style tapas, but amazing nonetheless and they did well adapting the theme to the space.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Had breakfast here during our stay at the Andaluz hotel. It was delicious, I recommend the continental breakfast with eggs. Delicious, especially the yogurt with fruit. Will definitely be going back.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We started with cocktails in the one of a kind lobby of a art deco meets old southwest.  After enjoying the 1939 hotel we went in for a magnificent meal. Kudos to Michael our waiter, Marc Quinones, chef, and Carlos the Manager for an unforgettable experience! Go for local drinks, port with desert.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Despite the price, food was mediocre.  Was expecting something mind blowing for an $80+ tab for 2.  Instead we got average food with canned and store-bought ingredients.  Ordered chicken pincho, NM flatiron steak, smoked salmon nachos and …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text:
Exquisite food and flavors. Beautiful space and warm staff. Our waiter Richard was engaging and helpful.
We would follow Executive Chef Marc Quinones anywhere. And have! We are fortunate to have him in Mew Mexico.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: My spouse and I ordered the classic paella. The entire dish was bathed in a heavy dark sauce that tasted like motor oil with a strong flavor of burnt chorizo. It was as if a mechanic at the Indy 500 tried making paella but accidentally used …

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Mas truly lives up to its name! The Ricotta pancakes were big enough and thick enough for 2 to share. Turkey sausage with green chili was on point with a bite at the end.  Did I mention the quinoa sweet potato hash? Breakfast worth the eating!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: MAS is totally a gem. If you're looking for your new go-to place this is IT. Chef Marc has a passion for food and his menu reflects it.  The wine selection is good and the staff is super attentive and knowledgeable. You must try this place if you haven't already!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: This is located in a building that's part of the Hilton hotel chain there botique group. It was the 1st hotel that was built by Conrad Hilton in New Mexico with his own money. Beautiful building if you go take a walk around look at some of the pictures and read some of the history

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Mark family to my brother an I the steak an potatoes was superb.  Tomohawk pork was great and chicken was moist

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: We had such a great experience here! Everything on the menu sounded so good and everything we got was amazing. We had really great, quick service and the outside seating area is beautiful!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Amazing on every way!

Review Text: The food was so-so and the service was fine however would not recommend for a large group. Not only did they require one tab but were very rude about it - management was extremely disrespectful to us as guests. Very hostile environment.

Review Text: Service top notch. Select your meal carefully; some entrees are outstanding, some are disappointing. Ambiance is lovely unless you encounter a bunch of drunken salesmen.

Review Text: Great food! Staff is friendly and helpful! Been back three times for the food this week! We don’t even live in town! Staff was helpful, hotel was great! We will be back again and again!

Review Text:
Good food nice environment but not what I expected from a Food network highly reviewed restraunt.
Papa's with garlic aoli were super addictive and we had an preparation cleanness issue that was quickly resolved and was handled very professionally.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: A very cute place very cozy.  Tapas were delicious   The artichoke with goat cheese, spicy shrimp and pork tenderloin are all with a taste.   Wash it down with the blood orange Sangria!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Fantastic place and ofcourse I will come back if a came to Albuquerque again

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Like many Tapas places the food is a little more expensive, but it was oh so good.  Great meal and atmosphere was good, except for the loud music coming from upstairs.  It was a Friday night so that might explain it.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: The drinks were very good.   Not quite as good as the Apothecary, but the service was much better and the atmosphere was more lively.  Was rather quiet for a Friday night, but this seems to be the norm so far in ABQ (I just moved here).  I will probably go here again.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Wonderful small plates for sharing. Quaint place to sit and chat

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: A relaxing place to sip cocktails and eat the tapas in a terrace setting. This venue would have been even greater if it had been situated on the roof to take advantage of the impressive vista.

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Awesome breakfast for gold and diamond members. Enough food for breakfast and lunch! Wonderful service too!

Name: Mas Tapas
Review Text: Very cool ambience and nice servers, but the price is a little too high for what you’re getting.

Review Text: Great atmosphere, dim lighting and romantic, food is delicious and well prepared. Expect to order lots of different dishes and it's a bit pricey.

Review Text: Since we arrived in ABQ late and were at the hotel, decided to eat at MÁS. The service and food was excellent. As for those that think the prices are high (and portions small) don't ever come to the SFBA.

Review Text: We had dinner here. The restaurant is part of the Conrad Hilton Hotel. You've got to check out just how special this historic hotel is.

Review Text: This place was amazing....I will be frequenting this restaurant.

Review Text: Oh my!  What a wonderful surprise, on a road trip from Ft. Worth to Durango. Stopped for lunch on Thanksgiving day. Everything was full of the most wonderful flavors. Presentation on point.
